products.title: Devon Shadow Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Devon shadow grey 89mm vertical blind in grey. Made to measure from 14.54 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Devon, a beautiful, soft and sophisticated pattern, which gives your home a warm feeling. A great addition.This grey vertical blind is ideal to add some effortless chic to any room in your home without breaking the bank.
 
 Product id: sdb-vtb0945 fabric colour: shadow grey material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable   slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Devon Shadow Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Devon shadow grey roller blind in grey. Made to measure from 15.13 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Taking influence from soft cloth fabric weaves, their devon range of roller blinds provide a stunning textured finish for your window dressing. Shadow grey is a beautiful soft grey shade. An on trend shade, ideal for modern interiors.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2243 fabric colour: shadow grey material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Devon Stripe Charcoal Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Stripes are ever popular and this devon stripe charcoal roman blind is a wonderful exponent of what stripes are all about.
